title: Trump says Russia will accept security guarantees for Ukraine, but talks of ‘possible exchanges of territory’ – live
summary: US president holds meeting with Zelenskyy and European leaders after touting ‘very substantial progress’ in Putin talks A Russian drone attack on a five-storey apartment block in the Ukrainian city of Kharkiv early Monday killed five people and wounded more than a dozen others, Ukrainian authorities said . The attack, which took place just before dawn, reduced part of the building to rubble and sparked fires on at least three floors, the region’s governor Oleg Synegubov said on Telegram. Continue reading...

title: Trump tells Zelenskyy ceasefire not needed for Russia-Ukraine peace deal
summary: Ukraine’s president received a warmer Oval Office welcome than last time but Trump rules out need for ceasefire Donald Trump has welcomed Ukraine’s Volodymyr Zelenskyy to the White House but appeared to rule out arranging a ceasefire as part of plans to try to end the country’s war with Russia. The US president’s meeting with Zelenskyy on Monday went more smoothly than their first encounter in the Oval Office six months ago, when the Ukrainian leader was ambushed and berated by Trump and Vice-President JD Vance . Continue reading...

title: Rural Texans continue push to regulate Bitcoin mining over noise, quality of life concerns
summary: Rural residents in Hood County are pressing for a community vote to gain more authority over a Bitcoin mining site that they say has disrupted their lives with round-the-clock industrial noise, local media outlet KERA News reported on Aug. 18. The mine, operated by Florida-based Marathon Digital Holdings, has been running for about three years […] The post Rural Texans continue push to regulate Bitcoin mining over noise, quality of life concerns appeared first on CryptoSlate .

title: Coinbase launches XRP and Solana perpetual futures for US traders
summary: Coinbase launches XRP and Solana perpetual futures in the US, as the SEC delays ETF decisions on XRP proposals from major issuers. The post Coinbase launches XRP and Solana perpetual futures for US traders appeared first on Crypto Briefing .

title: Crypto Influencer Sentenced To Prison In Multi-Million Dollar ‘Cryptojacking’ Scam
summary: The DOJ has described cryptojacking as the unauthorized use of others’ computing power to mine crypto. Charles O. Parks III has been sentenced to one year and a day; prosecutors have said he stole $3.5M in cloud resources and $1M in assets in 2021 for luxury spending. The post Crypto Influencer Sentenced To Prison In Multi-Million Dollar ‘Cryptojacking’ Scam appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Live Updates: Zelensky and European Leaders Press for Security Guarantees in Meeting with Trump
summary: President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine said that a full prisoner exchange was also essential to ending the war. Other European leaders also expressed their support for a cease-fire.
